page_content:
GLASS : -
PFAUDLER 9100-DARK BLUE
(DIN EN ISO 28721-1:2011-06 & DIN EN ISO 28721-4:2013-03 FOR PIPES & FITTINGS)
SPARK TEST :
INTERNAL INSPECTION : 20,000 V. ONLY ONCE.
PLUG FREE
FINAL INSPECTION : 10,000 V. (IN PRESENCE OF CLIENT)

1.
ALL DIMENSIONS ARE IN mm. UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED.
2.
THE BOLT HOLES OF FIXED FLANGES TO BE OFF C LS. OF VESSEL.
3.
EXTERNAL SURFACE PREP. : - SA 2½ SHOT BLASTING.
APPLY BY AIR SPRAY TWO FULL COATS OF AIR
DRYING, GLASS REINFORCED, RUST TOLERANT
COATING : COLOUR - RAL 5015 (SKY BLUE)
4. GENERAL TOLERANCES : DIN 28006.
5. N.D.T. :- MAIN WELD SEAMS OF INNER VESSEL TO BE 100
ULTRASONICALLY
TESTED FOR INTERNAL QUALITY ASSURANCE ONLY.
6.
PROVIDE CAP ON ALL C-CLAMP (COLOUR=BLUE, MOC=LIGHT DENSITY POLY ETHYLENE)
7.
RUNNING TRIAL TO BE TAKEN AT ATM. PRESSURE AND WITH WATER UP TO NOMINAL
CAPACITY. DURATION WILL BE ONE HOUR.
8.
VALUES OF STIRRING & SENSING VOLUME SHOWN ON DRAWING ARE THEORETICAL &
IN STATIC CONDITION. FINAL VALUES MAY CHANGE ACCORDING TO FABRICATION
TOLERANCE ALLOWED BY RESPECTIVE STANDARD.
9.
FOR LIMITATION ON OPERATING TEMPERATURE, REFER M SEAL DRAWING.
10. REQUIREMENTS FOR AGITATOR DRIVES AS PER DIN 28161.
